Description: Spacious 2 bed one bath available in desirable Ball Square of Somerville. Just steps from the new Ball Square Green Line Station and a quick walk to Tufts University, Davis Square (Red Line) 741 Broadway is well located and offers a handful of accessible locations for tenants. No Washer or Dryer in unit but Laundromat is located directly across the street. Tufts Market is across the street as well for easy shopping.
